incognito.no_support: This BitShares Wallet relies on Local Storage and IndexedDB which are not persistent when using Incognito Browsing. We recommend using a regular browsing session.

sync_fail.title: Failed to sync with the API server
sync_fail.sub_text_1: Please verify that your computer clock is correct.
sync_fail.sub_text_2: Once you've synchronized your clock, please refresh this page.<br/><br/>If your clock is already correct, the API server you're using could be out of sync. In that case, please try a different server from the list below.

header.title: EasyDex
header.unlock_airbitz_text: Create PIN to confirm your transactions
header.trader_mode_tip: Trader Mode gives you access to additional settings as well as the full Exchange interface, with less hints and descriptions.
header.trader_mode_notify: Trader mode activated, to return to simple mode please go to the Settings
header.locked_tip:
Click to login by unlocking your wallet.

Closing the browser window will also log you out.
header.unlocked_tip:
Click to log out by locking your wallet.

Closing the browser window will also log you out.

tooltip.account_dropdown: Click here to switch between accounts as well as to access the Settings, Block Explorer and Help sections.
tooltip.current_balance: This is your current balance of this asset.
tooltip.equivalent_balance: This is how much your current balance is worth in your prefered asset. You can change this asset in the Settings.
tooltip.trade_actions: Click here to either buy or sell this asset.
tooltip.pinning: Click here to pin or unpin an asset, which will display it regardless of your current holdings of that asset.
tooltip.transfer_actions: Click here to make a transfer, or to deposit/withdraw those assets that support it.
tooltip.deposit_tip: To complete the deposit, go to your %(asset)s wallet and make a transfer to the address listed on this page. You will receive the deposit as soon as it has been confirmed. If a memo is shown , it is essential that you include this memo in your transfer.
tooltip.withdraw_full: Click to withdraw the full balance
tooltip.withdraw_address: If you don't already have a %(asset)s address, please find a wallet provider and create one in order to complete the withdrawal.
tooltip.apply_price: This is the best market price currently available, you may click on it to use that price.
tooltip.apply_balance: This is your current balance. Click on it to use the full amount.
tooltip.asset_dropdown: Click here to select from a list of assets.
tooltip.cant_buy: You do not have any balances you can use to buy this asset with.
tooltip.call_limit: This is the call price of the least collateralized margin position in the market.
tooltip.margin_price: This is the maximum price that a margin called position can be made to pay. It also called the Squeeze Price.
tooltip.settle_price: This is the price at which settle orders will execute.
tooltip.sign_owner: If you are the owner of this account, please check this to make sure the transaction gets signed properly. This is only necessary if you are using the owner account and that account is not included in the active permissions.
tooltip.latest_price: This is the latest price seen in this market.
tooltip.no_price: There's no recent price available for this asset that can be used to estimate its value.
tooltip.hide_asset: Click here to hide this asset from this list.
tooltip.show_asset: Click here to show this asset in the main list.
tooltip.settle: Settling will let you convert your holdings of %(asset)s to BTS after a delay of 24 hours, at a price equal to the feed price at that time.
tooltip.filter_ops: Use this list to filter your history by operation type.
tooltip.show_block: Click here to show block #%(block)s where this transaction occurred.
tooltip.coll_ratio: The collateral ratio of the position is COLLATERAL * FEED PRICE / DEBT.
tooltip.call_price: This is the call price of the position. If the feed price goes below the call price, the position will be margin called.
tooltip.close_position: Click here to close your position. You will need to have at least %(amount)s %(asset)s in order to do so.
tooltip.update_position: Click here to update your position. You may at any time change the debt and/or collateral levels of your position.
tooltip.cr_danger: This position is currently being margin called. Consider adding collateral to bring the collateral ratio above %(mr)s or closing the position.
tooltip.cr_warning: This position has a low level of collateral, and will get margin called if the collateral ratio drops below %(mr)s. Consider adding collateral or closing the position.
tooltip.propose_scam: This proposal was created by a known scammer, do not approve it!
tooltip.login:
This BitShares wallet does not offer a traditional login but instead simply locks or unlocks a wallet that is only stored locally in your browser.

Whenever you close the wallet it will be locked and you will effectively be logged out.
tooltip.buy_min: You will receive at minimum this amount. If there are matching orders with a cheaper price than you specified, you will receive more than this amount.
tooltip.borrow: Borrow %(asset)s from the network. This creates a smart contract that locks your collateral until you either modify the position or a margin call is required.
tooltip.transfer_actions: Click here to make a transfer, or to deposit/withdraw those assets that support it.
tooltip.deposit_tip: To complete the deposit, go to your external %(asset)s wallet and make a transfer to the address listed on this page. You will receive the deposit as soon as it has been confirmed. If a memo is shown , it is essential that you include this memo in your transfer.
tooltip.copy_tip: Click here to copy the text to your clipboard
tooltip.withdraw_full: Click to withdraw the full balance
tooltip.withdraw_address: If you don't already have a %(asset)s address, please find a wallet provider and create one in order to complete the withdrawal.
tooltip.memo_tip: You may include any message in the memo field. Memos are optional but generally required for transfers to exchanges.
tooltip.generate: The generated password was created by your browser, locally. <br /><br /><strong>No one but you has access to it</strong>.<br /><br /> Paste it below and save a copy in a safe place
tooltip.copy_password: Click here to copy the password to your clipboard
tooltip.sync_yes: The current node is in sync with the blockchain
tooltip.sync_no: The current node is out of sync with the blockchain, try switching to another one
tooltip.disconnected: You are not connected to an API node, try reloading or setting a new access point in the Settings
tooltip.market_fee: The owner of %(asset)s charges a market fee of %(percent)s%% for buy orders. This fee will be subtracted from the amount you receive when your order fills, it is not paid when placing an order.
tooltip.bridge_TRADE: BlockTrades is a bridge which supports instant trade of assets. Details and terms can be found on https://blocktrades.us
tooltip.over_limit: The bridge does not have enough of the desired asset for this buy order
tooltip.withdraw_blockchain_fee:
Blockchain Fee is a fee, that has to be payed for the transactions in the BitShares Blockchain.
Fee can be payed in any tokens, user has enough on user's balance. Fee amount is deducted from the selected tokens balance or, if the amount on the balance is not enough after the 'Amount to Withdraw' exclusion, fee can be also deducted from the 'Amount to Withdraw' value.
tooltip.withdraw_take_from_amount: Blockchain Fee will be deducted (or partly deducted) from the entered 'Amount to Withdraw' value.
tooltip.receive_blockchain_fee:
Blockchain Fee is a fee, that has to be payed for the transactions in the BitShares Blockchain.
Fee can be payed in any tokens, user has enough on user's balance.
Fee amount is deducted from the balance of the tokens user selected to pay the fee with.
tooltip.withdraw_fee: Withdrawal Fee is a fee, that has to be payed for the withdrawal operation execution. Fee amount is deducted from the 'Amount to Withdraw' value.

account.centralized: Built on the BitShares decentralized exchange, EasyDex is the easiest and fastest way to trade crypto!
account.intro_text_2: <b>The DEX</b> is inherently decentralized, enabling you to trade the BitShares core token (BTS) and a range of trustless price-stable, market-pegged assets such as bitUSD, bitCNY, bitBTC, bitGold and more. These assets can all be traded with <b>zero</b> counter-party risk, putting you in total control of your funds.
account.intro_text_3: <b>The DEX</b> also enables creation of user-issued assets (UIAs), which can be traded against any other UIAs or trustless assets on the platform.  One well-known issuer on The DEX is <b>EasyDex</b>, offering a host of assets including BTC, ETH, STEEM, DASH, LTC, DOGE, and many more
account.intro_text_4: This gives cryptocurrency traders a unique blend of traditional and decentralized trading, all in a familiar exchange interface. Happy trading!
account.in_open: This is the amount of %(asset)s you have in open orders.
account.in_open_value: This is the equivalent value of the %(asset)s you have in open orders.
account.total_estimate: This is the estimated value of all your assets, including any hidden assets, open orders, debt and collateral. The estimate is done using only live blockchain data and may not be perfectly accurate.
account.name: Account name
account.bans_scam: This account is not the real %(ban_name)s account, perhaps you meant account: %(real_name)s
account.polo_scam: This account is not the real Poloniex account, please send to this account: poloniexwallet.
account.ol_scam: This account is not the real EasyDex account, please send to this account: EasyDex-wallet.
account.bittrex_scam: This account is not the real Bittrex account, please send to this account: bittrex-deposit.
account.other_scam: This account is not known to be an official account, please verify the destination before transferring

vesting.title: Vesting balances
vesting.no_balances: This account has no vesting balances
vesting.explain: Vesting balances contain any fees earned through the referral program or from worker pay for example. They have a certain vesting period and are continually unlocked during that vesting period until all funds are available

member.referral_text: Give this to link to people you want to refer to EasyDex

user_issued_assets.name: Asset Name
user_issued_assets.max_positive: Max supply should be a positive number
user_issued_assets.too_large: That max supply is too big, please choose a smaller number
user_issued_assets.override_authority: Issuer may transfer asset back to himself
user_issued_assets.committee_fed_asset: Allow committee members to provide feeds
user_issued_assets.global_settle: Allow issuer to force a global settling
user_issued_assets.need_asset: At least one of the two assets must be %(name)s
user_issued_assets.perm_warning: WARNING: Permissions may only be disabled, once disabled they may not be reactivated!!
user_issued_assets.maximum_force_settlement_volume: Max force settle volume (percent of total supply per hour)
user_issued_assets.error_precision: That asset does not have the same precision as %(asset)s
user_issued_assets.error_invalid: That asset may not be used
user_issued_assets.precision_warning: Warning: The number of decimals may not be changed after creation
user_issued_assets.visible: Hide asset from search and markets
user_issued_assets.cer_warning_2: Make sure your core exchange rate is higher than the market price, otherwise people will buy your token from the market and drain your fee pool via implicit arbitrage. The core exchange rate should be updated regularly to reflect market pricing of your asset.

perm.warning1: Active permissions weights total of %(weights_total)s should be equal or exceed threshold of %(threshold)s
perm.warning2: Owner permissions weights total of %(weights_total)s should be equal or exceed threshold of %(threshold)s
perm.warning3: Account is already in the list
perm.warning4: Key is already in the list
perm.password_model_1: If you want to be able to login from anywhere using only your password and account name, you can use this page to add new keys to your permissions. If you also want to remove the original keys, you can do so in the active/owner permissions tabs.
perm.memo_warning: WARNING: If you replace the memo key you will be unable to read old memos when logging in with your password, and unless you import the new memo private key into your old wallet that wallet will be unable to decode new memos

signedmessages.invalidformat: Signed message format can't be recognized

signedmessages.invalidsignature: The content of the message could be validated against the signature

account.deposit_address: Your deposit address is your account name

fast_voting.invitation_intro: It gives us great pleasure to offer you the opportunity to take part in the development of the EasyDex DC.
fast_voting.invitation_explanation: As you know, BitShares is a blockchain based on {DPOS consensus} (link), which means that your funds (stake) influence the quality and stability of the entire network. It is therefore important that you are voting actively and regularly, according to the rapidly changing developments within the blockchain (witness & committees structure and stats, working proposals, etc.). Everything related to voting can be found {here} link.
fast_voting.invitation_conclusion: If you are not able to stay updated on the developments and an active voter, we suggest an alternative option - to delegate your votes to EasyDex, by choosing the official EasyDex account as a 'proxy'. This will be a great support for EasyDex as a project, and it will allow you to automatically vote for the same proposals as EasyDex. This will ensure that your votes (funds) are active on the network, and we promise that we will handle your votes with due diligence and responsibility, by supporting proposals that benefits the overall network and in partcular our users - the only way for EasyDex to succeed is for its users to succeed!
fast_voting.invitation_click: If you would like to support EasyDex, simply click the 'Vote' button below:
fast_voting.title: Vote for EasyDex

errors.not_found: The account %(name)s does not exist, are you sure you spelled it correctly?

name_input.premium_name_faucet: This is a premium name which is not supported by this faucet. Please enter a regular name containing least one dash, a number or no vowels.
name_input.premium_name_warning: This is a premium name which is more expensive than a name containing a dash (-) or a number.

forgot_pass.text_1: To recover your password, enter your username below.
forgot_pass.text_2: Check the email you provided at the time of registration for further instructions on recovering your password. Further instructions have been emailed to the address provided at registration. You may need to check your spam folder.

answer_verification.page1_text_1: To proceed with password recovery please enter the answer to the test question given at account registration (not case sensitive).
answer_verification.page2_text_1: You have successfully decrypted your password! Your password is:

operation.limit_order_sell: {account} placed an order to sell {amount} at {price}
operation.limit_order_buy: {account} placed an order to buy {amount} at {price}
operation.call_order_update: {account} changed {debtSymbol} debt by {debt} and collateral by {collateral}
operation.asset_update_feed_producers: {account} updated the feed producers for the asset {asset}
operation.witness_create: {account} was upgraded to become a witness
operation.worker_create: {account} created a worker proposal with daily pay of {pay}

proposal.limit_order_create: Place order to buy %(buy_amount)s for %(sell_amount)s for %(account)s
proposal.limit_order_sell: Place an order to sell {amount} at {price} for {account}
proposal.limit_order_buy: Place an order to buy {amount} at {price} for {account}
proposal.asset_create: Create the asset %(asset)s using the account {account}
proposal.asset_update: Update the asset {asset} using the account {account}
proposal.override_transfer: Transfer {amount} from {from} to {to} by authority of {issuer}

transaction.feed_producer: Became a feed producer for the asset
transaction.asset_claim_fees: claimed asset fees of %(balance_amount)s from %(asset)s fee pool
transaction.csv_tip: Download history as comma separated .csv file

fee_pool.title: Fee Pool
fee_pool.fund_text: The fee pool is used to pay fees in %(core)s by converting the fee in %(asset)s to %(core)s. If the fee pool runs out of funds, fees may no longer be paid in %(asset)s and will default to %(core)s
fee_pool.claim_text: The asset issuer may claim any accumulated fees here.

whitelist.enable_flag: The whitelist flag must be enabled in order to set whitelist authorities

committee_members.title: Committee members
committee_members.active: Total number of active committee members

workers.title: Worker name
workers.create_text_1: In order to create your new worker, please fill in the form below. The worker will be created using your currently active account, which must already be a lifetime member.
workers.create_text_2: Consider carefully the parameters you choose as they can not be changed once you've published your worker.
workers.name_text: The name of your worker should be short and descriptive, something like this: 'Worker Purpose - Account Name'
workers.date_text: The start date should be at least a week into the future in order to allow people the time to discover, evaluate and vote for your worker.
workers.pay_text: The daily pay defines how much you want to be paid per day and is defined in BTS. The current best practice is to define a salary in USD/CNY, and commit to burning whatever surplus you receive as a result of the BTS price increasing. As long as your worker is active and has sufficient votes to be above the refund worker, you will receive this daily salary.
workers.url_text: You should supply a website, github document or google doc that describes in more detail the purpose of the worker and how you intend to use the worker pay.
workers.vesting_text: The vesting period defines the number of days that worker earnings will vest before being fully claimable.

settings.confirmMarketOrder: Ask for confirmation of market orders
settings.faucet_address_text: The faucet address is used to pay the registration fee for new users.
settings.showSettles: Show settle orders in depth chart
settings.showAssetPercent: Show asset percentages on the account page
settings.no_accounts: This wallet does not contain any accounts.
settings.wallet_text: Control the details of your wallet.
settings.restore_text: Restore from a backup or import keys.
settings.backup_legacy: Import a BTS 0.9.3c key export file (.json)
settings.backup_brainkey: Restore using a local wallet brainkey
settings.backup_favorites: Restore favorites using a json file
settings.backupcreate_airbitz_account_text: Create backup with Airbitz for an account model. Please note, AirBitz holds keys forever.
settings.not_yet_have_account: You not yet have account for create backup.
settings.lookup_text: Click the button below to check for unclaimed balances from BTS 1.0
settings.restore_brainkey_text: In order to restore from a brainkey, you will need to create a new wallet. Please provide a password and name for your new wallet below, then enter your brainkey.
settings.wallet_required_text: In order to restore a backup you will need to switch to the wallet model first, do so by clicking the button below
settings.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove %(name)s from your available nodes?
settings.valid_node_url: Node URL must begin with ws:// or wss://
settings.connection_error: Unable to connect to API node %(url)s, falling back to known working nodes

footer.title: EasyDex
footer.nosync: Blockchain is out of sync, please wait until it's synchronized..

exchange.confirm_buy: Your order is %(diff)s times higher than the lowest ask, are you sure?
exchange.confirm_sell: Your order is %(diff)s times lower than the highest bid, are you sure?
exchange.confirm_no_orders_buy: You are placing a buy order in a market with no open sell orders. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
exchange.confirm_no_orders_sell: You are placing a sell order in a market with no open buy orders. Are you certain you wish to proceed?
exchange.market_frozen: The owner of %(asset)s has disabled trading in this market.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.create_importkeys_text: In order to import keys, you first need to create a local wallet to contain the keys. Complete the dialog below to create a new local wallet.
wallet.delete_confirm_line2: Unexpected bad things will happen if you don’t read this!
wallet.delete_confirm_line3: This action CANNOT be undone, and if you do not have a backup this wallet will be gone.
wallet.name: Wallet Name
wallet.import_backup_choose: To import your local wallet select your backup file below. This file is not uploaded and does not leave your browser.
wallet.confirm_error: The confirmation does not match the password
wallet.wallet_exist: Wallet exists, choose a new name
wallet.wallet_exist_with_name: Wallet (%(name)s) exists, please change the name
wallet.unclaimed: Unclaimed balances belonging to these keys
wallet.pwd4brainkey: Enter your password to show your brainkey
wallet.brainkey_w1: To complete your backup, print this out, or write it down.
wallet.brainkey_w2: Anyone with access to your recovery key will
wallet.brainkey_w3: have access to funds within this wallet.
wallet.brainkey_airbitz_created: Your key was saved in Airbitz wallet
wallet.brainkey_airbitz_will_create: Please note, Airbitz holds keys forever.
wallet.never_backed_up: This wallet has never been backed up, you should create a backup now!
wallet.create_text: The EasyDex wallet is stored in your browser, it is not stored in the cloud. A wallet can contain multiple accounts and can be easily transferred between browsers and computers using a backup file.
wallet.account_create_wallet_text: This password will be used to create a new EasyDex wallet for you, which will only be stored locally in your browser. An EasyDex wallet can contain multiple accounts and can be easily transferred between browsers and computers using a backup file.
wallet.create_account_text: When creating a web wallet account through EasyDex you have the option to have an encrypted copy of your password stored on our servers for account recovery. With this option, you set the encryption key so we will not have direct access to your password.
wallet.create_local_account_text_1: The local wallet stores all your account details in a file on your computer. This wallet can be imported to any browser using the backup file created. IF YOU LOSE THIS FILE YOU WILL BE UNABLE TO ACCESS YOUR ACCOUNT AND NO RECOVERY IS POSSIBLE! It is recommeded that you store a copy of the back up file in multiple safe locations.
wallet.create_local_account_text_2: For a free account your account name must contain either a hyphen (-) or numbers (ie: easy-dex or easydex123). Password must be at least 8 characters though we recommend using at least 20. Password should contain a mix of upper and lower case letters, numbers, and special characters.
wallet.first_account_paid: Since this is your first account with EasyDex, we are paying the registration fee for you to say welcome.
wallet.remember_please_you: Remember please, you are the only one in control of your private keys to access your account, so you need to make sure to follow instructions to save your backup key when prompted. This is very important for you to enjoy all the great features of the EasyDex DEX.
wallet.not_first_account: Since you already have an account, you will need to pay for this new account yourself. In order to do so, your account needs to have lifetime membership, which can be bought in the account page.
wallet.must_be_ltm: The fee paying account must be a lifetime member to perform that operation.
wallet.backup_explain: Clicking on the button below will generate a backup file with a .bin extension. This file is encrypted with your wallet password, and contains all the private keys for your accounts. It can be used to restore your wallet, or move it to a different computer/browser.
wallet.backup_new_account: Congratulations, you've just created a new account! It is strongly recommended that you make a backup of your wallet now. Without a backup there is no way to restore your account if something happens to your computer.
wallet.brainkey_not_backed_up: This brainkey has never been backed up
wallet.brainkey_backed_up: This brainkey was last backed up
wallet.change_backup: Now that you've changed your password, we highly recommend making a new backup.
wallet.paste_private: Paste private keys here (Wallet Import Format - WIF)
wallet.claim_later: Once you've imported the keys, you can claim these balances to an account of your choosing.
wallet.import_pass_match: Password matches. Decrypting the backup now...
wallet.wallet_browser: Your Web Browser is your Wallet
wallet.has_wallet: When you create your first EasyDex account, an EasyDex wallet will be automatically created as well and stored in your browser.
wallet.wallet_crucial: Your wallet is only stored in your browser, so it is crucial that you create a backup that will enable you to recover your wallet if the data in your browser is lost! No one else can restore your account if you lose your backup.
wallet.wallet_crucial_airbitz:
Your Wallet has been created. You can already use it without AirBitz connection.

To connect AirBitz wallet please be sure that you have downloaded AirBitz app to your mobile device and your AirBitz account have created.

Please note - within one airbitz account you can create several wallets, but only one airbitz wallet can be connected to one EasyDex account.
If you own several EasyDex accounts, each account should have only one airbitz wallet connected to it.
If you try to connect your EasyDex account with an airbitz wallet that is/was previously connected to another EasyDex account, you will lose access through airbitz to the first open ledger account connected.
wallet.wallet_move: This backup file can also be used to move your wallet to different computers or different browsers. In order to restore your wallet using this backup you will also need your password!
wallet.wallet_move_airbitz: Backup file can also be used to move your wallet to different computers or different browsers. In order to restore your wallet using this backup you will also need your password!
wallet.wallet_lose_warning: IMPORTANT: If you lose your wallet or your passphrase you will be unable to access any of your funds again. Make sure you store the backup somewhere safe, and memorize or write down your password!
wallet.wallet_lose_warning_airbitz: IF YOU LOSE YOUR WALLET OR YOUR PASSPHRASE YOU WILL BE UNABLE TO ACCESS ANY OF YOUR FUNDS AGAIN. MAKE SURE YOU STORE THE BACKUP SOMEWHERE SAFE, AND MEMORIZE OR WRITE DOWN YOUR PASSWORD!
wallet.tips_explore: Now that you've successfully created an account and downloaded the backup, it's time to get started. Click on one of the links on the left to start exploring.
wallet.tips_explore_airbitz: Now that you've successfully created an account and it's time to get started. Click on one of the links on the left to start exploring.
wallet.tips_header: You can also find these same links in the top menu, and in the drop-down menu next to your account name.
wallet.tips_login: IMPORTANT: There is no login/logout functionality here, you merely unlock your wallet when you wish to make a transaction.
wallet.brainkey_seq_reset_text:
Use this to reset the sequence counter used to derive private keys from the wallet brainkey.
It can be used to force a refresh of the private keys in the wallet.
wallet.brainkey_reset_success: Sequence reset. In order to trigger a refresh of your private keys, refresh your browser then unlock the wallet.
wallet.password_lose_warning: IMPORTANT: If you forget your passphrase you will be unable to access your account, we cannot reset or restore your password! Make sure you memorize or write down your password!
wallet.password_crucial: In case you haven't already done so, it is crucial that you take the time to write down your password now, whether it be on paper, a password manager, or somewhere else. If you lose or forget this password your account will be lost, we cannot help you get it back.
wallet.tips_explore_pass: Now that you've successfully created an account and backed up your password, it's time to get started. Click on one of the links on the left to start exploring.
wallet.create_account_password_text: A web wallet account allows you to log in to your account from any browser on any device with internet access. For a free account your name must contain either a hyphen (-) or number(s) (ie: easy-dex or easydex123) To ensure security, your password must be at least 20 characters and contain upper and lower case letters and numbers. We recommend you to use the password generator.
wallet.create_password: Create a new account using a password
wallet.wallet_model_1: The wallet model stores the wallet in your browser. It is encrypted with a password that you choose, and can be backed up using either a brainkey or an encrypted binary file that contains all the private keys. The wallet model lets you use multiple accounts at the same time.
wallet.wallet_model_2: The local wallet is restricted to your current browser and computer and can be migrated to another browser or computer using a backup file or brainkey stored on your computer. The local wallet is more secure than the web wallet but can not be restored if the backup file is lost. If using the local wallet we recommend storing the backup file or brainkey in multiple secure locations such as a USB flash drive.
wallet.password_model_1: The account model uses a password in combination with your account name to generate your private keys on the fly. It restricts you to only logging in with one account at a time, in return for ease of use and convenience.
wallet.password_model_2: The web wallet allows you to login from any computer with internet access. It is less secure than the local wallet so a password of at least 20 characters is required. We recommend using the random password generator. With the web wallet you have the option to store an encrypted copy of your password with EasyDex for account recovery in case you lose your password.
wallet.have_an_old: Restore using a wallet model without Airbitz
wallet.pass_length: The password must contain at least %(minLength)s characters. Ideally you should use 20 or more, and a combination of numbers, special characters and letters.
wallet.welcome_to_the: Welcome to the EasyDex Decentralized Exchange (DEX)
wallet.airbitz_full_description: Airbitz is a fully user controlled, client-side encrypted, auto backed-up wallet for decentralized apps. Airbitz gives user the familiar user experience of a simple web account while providing full privacy and security of transactions and funds. No 3rd parties, including Airbitz or EasyDex can access funds secured with an Airbitz account.
wallet.no_wallet: You do not have a wallet yet
wallet.understand_1: Store an encrypted copy of my password with EasyDex
wallet.understand_2: I have written down or otherwise stored my password
wallet.bts_rules:
The first rule of BitShares is: Do not lose your password.
The second rule of BitShares is: Do not lose your password.
The third rule of BitShares is: We cannot recover your password.
The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
The seventh rule: Always back up your password.
wallet.heading_1: Store an encrypted copy of password with EasyDex
wallet.answer_error: Please enter your answer, at least 5 symbols

errors.below: Your collateral ratio is below %(mr)s which is not allowed.
errors.close: Your collateral ratio is close to %(mr)s which means this position is in danger of being margin called if the price drops.

confirmation.title: The address you entered does not appear valid, are you sure you want to make the withdrawal?

qrcode.label: qrcode
qrcode.title: Private key QR code
qrcode.input_message: Please enter a password used to encrypt the QR code.<br />An empty password will show an unencrypted QR code.

init_error.title: Application initialization issues
init_error.browser_text: The Browser you are using has not been fully tested to support the BitShares Wallet. We highly recommend that you backup your wallet and import it using the Chrome Browser until we have had more time to fully test your browser of choice. Use at your own risk.

fiat.choose_deposit: Please select the currency you would like to deposit
fiat.choose_withdraw: Please select the currency you would like to withdraw

verified.deposit_text_1: Verified users may deposit up to $10,000. Funds can be deposited via wire (SWIFT/BIG) transfer using the bank details below.
verified.deposit_text_2_0: All transfers MUST include your Bitshares username in the memo (description,reference, reason or message) field.
verified.deposit_text_2: Within 24 hours of receiving the bank wire we will credit your account with an equal amount of EasyDex.US minus any bank fees. Minimum deposit $100. For larger deposits please contact us at:
verified.deposit_text_3: EasyDex is unable to accept deposits from or process withdrawals to any country on the EU sanctions list.
verified.deposit_text_4: For more information or to see if these sanctions apply in your country visit
verified.withdraw_text_1: All users will need to be verified to withdraw fiat to their USD or EUR account. To verify your account please visit the link below:

not_verified.deposit_text_1: Unverified users may deposit up to $5000 per month. Funds can be deposited via wire (SWIFT) transfer using the bank details below.
not_verified.deposit_text_2_0: All transfers MUST include your Bitshares username in the memo (description,reference, reason or message) field.
not_verified.deposit_text_2: Within 24 hours of receiving the bank wire we will credit your account with an equal amount of EasyDex.US minus any bank fees. Minimum deposit $100. To increase these limits you can verify your account at:
not_verified.deposit_text_3: EasyDex is unable to accept deposits from or process withdrawals to any country on the EU sanctions list.
not_verified.deposit_text_4: For more information or to see if these sanctions apply in your country visit
not_verified.withdraw_text_1: All users will need to be verified to withdraw fiat to their USD or EUR account. To verify your account please visit the link below:

verified.deposit_text_2_0: All transfers MUST include your Bitshares username in the memo (description,reference, reason or message) field.
verified.deposit_text_2: Within 24 hours of receiving the bank wire we will credit your account with an equal amount of EasyDex.EU minus any bank fees. Minimum deposit €100. For larger deposits please contact us at:

verified.deposit_text_4: For more information or to see if these sanctions apply in your country visit

gateway.please_enter_correct_withdraw_address: Please make sure you have entered the correct address/account name!
gateway.minimal_deposit: Minimum amount to deposit %(minDeposit)s . Deposits lower than this will be considered a donation!
gateway.service_unavailable: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
gateway.title: Deposit & Withdraw
gateway.text_under_title_1: If you experience any problems with our bridges or gateways visit us on
gateway.text_under_title_4: and we would be happy to help you as soon as possible.

assets.open: The %(asset)s asset is backed 1:1 by real %(backed)s and can be deposited or withdrawn using the gateway service provided by EasyDex.
assets.trade: The %(asset)s asset is backed 1:1 by real %(backed)s and can be deposited or withdrawn using the gateway service provided by Blocktrades.
assets.bit: bit%(asset)s is a derivative that tracks the real value of %(backed)s. It is 100%% decentralized, trustless and backed by collateral held by the blockchain in a smart contract.
assets.bitcny: bitCNY can be deposited or withdrawn 1:1 to real Yuan using the gateway service provided by Transwiser. For more info, see https://www.transwiser.com/

gateway.bitkapital_text: Choose an asset to deposit or withdraw:
gateway.deposit_to: Please send your %(asset)s to the address below
gateway.deposit_notice_delay: (new address can be generated once per 5 minutes)
gateway.add_funds: Quickly and easily add funds to your BitShares account %(account)s. This service is provided by EasyDex.
gateway.withdraw_funds: You are going to withdraw funds from your BitShares account to your external %(asset)s account.
gateway.label_get_recent_eth_dates: Check your ETH address to see your upcoming withdraw
gateway.choose_deposit: Please select the coin you would like to deposit
gateway.choose_withdraw: Please select the coin you would like to withdraw
gateway.withdraw_to: Click the button below to open %(asset)s withdrawal
gateway.support_block: For support, please contact EasyDex at:
gateway.valid_miner_fee: Please enter a valid miner fee. Minimum is %(minFee)s
gateway.fee_sat_byte_estimate: EasyDex estimate transaction fees are calculated in sat/byte. Our calculation is based on 1000bytes per transaction . The minimum fee is 3sat/byte=3000satoshi and the minimum withdraw is 100 000satoshis . User can set fee in the Miner fee box .

withdraw_popup_bottom_text.BTC: EasyDex estimate transaction fees are calculated in sat/byte. Our calculation is based on 1000bytes per transaction . The minimum fee is 3sat/byte=3000satoshi and the minimum withdraw is 100 000satoshis . User can set fee in the Miner fee box .
withdraw_popup_bottom_text.STEEM: For withdraw to your steem account use your steem username as address , if you try to withdraw to an exchange use the exchange parameters ( address and memo ).
withdraw_popup_bottom_text.SBD: For withdraw to your steem account use your steem username as address , if you try to withdraw to an exchange use the exchange parameters ( address and memo ).

gateway.bridge_text: A bridge lets you exchange an asset into another one, for example BTC to BTS.
gateway.gateway_text: Choose whether you want to make a deposit or withdrawal here
gateway.fiat_text: Note: Fiat gateways are closed till further notice. Sorry for the inconvenience!

transwiser.alipay_account_name_notice: Normally it's your Alipay account username or mobile phone number
transwiser.alipay_realname_notice: Withdraw to Alipay, please provide real name in MEMO field to verify
transwiser.withdraw_note: Currently only ALIPAY withdraw is supported.  Your asset will be converted at 1:1 ratio and send RMB to your ALIPAY account.

gateway.purchase_1: Quickly and easily purchase %(outputAsset)s using %(inputAsset)s from an external wallet. This service is provided by EasyDex
gateway.purchase_notice: %(inputAsset)s sent to this address will show up as %(outputAsset)s
gateway.purchase_notice_memo: Memo required for proper routing to your account
gateway.unavailable: The gateway service for this asset is currently down, please try again later
gateway.unavailable_bridge: The bridge service for this asset is currently down, please try again later
gateway.unavailable_OPEN: The OpenLedger Gateway is down or not responding
gateway.unavailable_TRADE: The Blocktrades Bridge is down or not responding

rmbpay.info: RMBPAY Transfer Service provides an opportunity to carry out deposit and withdrawal operations with CNY currency using the Alipay payment service.
rmbpay.deposit_info: After deposit of CNY you will receive the corresponding amount of RMBPAY tokens on your EasyDex account.
rmbpay.withdrawal_info: After withdrawal of RMBPAY you will receive the corresponding amount of CNY currency on your Alipay account.
rmbpay.deposit_min_amount: Amount to deposit must be more than %(fee)s CNY
rmbpay.captcha_label: Please enter the text you see in the box above
rmbpay.max_requests_error:
You have exceeded the allowed number of deposit requests.
Next request will be available on %(date)s UTC.
rmbpay.wrong_captcha_error: Captcha value is wrong. Please try again
rmbpay.error_max_value: Amount to withdraw must be more or equal than %(val)s RMBPAY
rmbpay.error_min_value: Amount to withdraw must be less or equal than %(val)s RMBPAY
rmbpay.error_min_receive: Amount to receive must be more or equal than 1 CNY
rmbpay.error_max_receive: Amount to receive must be less or equal than %(val)s CNY
rmbpay.not_enaught_balance:
Operation can not be performed.
You don`t have enough tokens to pay the Fee.
rmbpay.scan_qr: To complete the deposit scan the QR-code and send money to that address
rmbpay.transfer_24_h: Tokens will be transferred to your account in 24 hours

withdrawal_modal.withdraw_amount: I want to Withdraw the amount of RMBPAY
withdrawal_modal.receive_amount: I want to Receive the amount of CNY

chat.title: News
chat.purchase_1: Quickly and easily purchase %(outputAsset)s using %(inputAsset)s from an external wallet. This service is provided by Blocktrades
chat.welcome: Please visit BitShares via Telegram or Discord!
chat.disconnected: You are currently not connected to any peers or the central server, please click below to reconnect. If you are unable to connect, this might mean the server is down, please try again later.

popups.get_latest: And get latest news about EasyDex.
popups.residents: Are you a resident in or are you holding a passport issued by any of the following countries?
popups.full_name: the full name of the coin
popups.dear_coin: Dear coin developers or its official representatives, now you have possibility of listing your asset on our exchange. You are to make a request to implement a coin and we will process your request during 2-3 working days.

root.welcome_to_the: Welcome to the EasyDex Decentralized Exchange (DEX)
root.the_openLedger_dex_is_a_cryptocurrency: The EasyDex DEX is a cryptocurrency trading platform acting as the skeleton for constant innovation.
root.designed_for_high_speed_transactions: Designed for high-speed transactions, the EasyDex DEX allows you to trade assets in real time, securely, with ultra-low fees.
root.the_openLedger_dex: The EasyDex DEX - Amazing Trading at Your Fingertips
root.we_let_you_send_it: We let you send it anywhere in the world within seconds.
root.you_are_always_in_control: You are always in control, and your identity can never be stolen.
root.you_can_spend_your_money_instantly_using: You can spend your money instantly using both mobile app and QR codes, and soon, anywhere major debit cards are accepted. We handle the conversions for you.
root.your_money_goes_directly_from: Your money goes directly from you to its destination.
root.only_those_you_authorize_can: Only those you authorize can see your accounts. We make our ledgers public for transparency, but you can keep yours private.
root.share_control_of_accounts_with: Share control of accounts with friends, family, and business associates with complete accountability and flexibility, never before available in legacy banking.
root.compilance_of_kyc: Compilance of KYC (Know Your Customer) and AML laws (Anti Money Laundering), same as with any deposit and withdrawals of FIAT Currency.
root.the_openLedger_offers_the_users_a_wallet: The EasyDex offers the users a wallet of their own located directly on the BitShares blockchain, with multi-signature accounts, referral system, a financial platform for crypto currencies with a fiat gateway.
root.the_openledger_decentralized_exchange: The EasyDex Decentralized Exchange (DEX) is designed for high-speed transactions, EasyDex DEX allows users to trade assets in real time, securely, and with ultra-low fees.
root.lifetime_members_get: Lifetime Members get 80% cashback on every transaction fee they pay and qualify to earn referral income from users they register with or refer to the network.
root.openLedger_lets_you_send_money: EasyDex lets you send money anywhere in the world, within seconds. Your money goes directly from you to its destination. No middlemen ever get control of your money.
root.use_basic_mode: Use basic mode - simple and excellent for beginners - if you are not pro-trader. This mode is also good for using on mobile devices. Need more? Go to Advanced Mode!
root.no_one_can_freeze: No one can freeze, seize, hack or attack your wealth. You are always in control and your identity can never be stolen.

trx_error.expire: Your transaction has expired without being confirmed, please try again later.

migration.title: Notice
migration.announcement_1: In an effort to provide enhanced security for the web-based wallet, we are migrating it, effective immediately to the address below. Please be sure to update any bookmarks you may have.
migration.text_2: Please backup your wallet now and restore the backup file to https://wallet.bitshares.org, which will be your new address for the web wallet. Thanks for your continued support.
migration.text_3: Please use https://wallet.bitshares.org from now on, your existing credentials will let you login there as well.
